title: How to Add a Business Photo on Yelp

steps.headline: Scan your pictures into your computer, or upload your pictures from your camera, depending on where your pictures have been saved/stored.
Visit the Yelp webpage.
steps.description: Once the page displays, there are many areas of the page, as well as several text fields to find your item.

steps.headline: Search for the business through the business name and location.
steps.description:
Towards the top of the page should be two text boxes. Fill in the business name in the top-left box and the location of the EXACT place. (i.e. If your business is located in Philadelphia, and the corporate location is in East Oshkosh, WI, type in Philadelphia, PA", or you may type in the exact zip code of this business. Try not to review corporate locations as locations in other cities. It's a one-to-one deal! On the page that is displayed, you'll find your search suggestions for the business. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/6\/6f\/Add-a-Business-Photo-on-Yelp-Step-3Bullet1.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Business-Photo-on-Yelp-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/6\/6f\/Add-a-Business-Photo-on-Yelp-Step-3Bullet1.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Business-Photo-on-Yelp-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"} If the business you want is not displayed, you'll have to do a little more work.

steps.headline: Locate the business photo area of the business.
steps.description: It should be just slightly to the right of the business' address.

steps.headline: Click the (red with white lettering)"Choose photos" button.
Choose the photo you want to upload.
Wait a few moments for the photo to upload to the Yelp database of photos for the business.

methods.name: Via the Yelp for iPhone App

steps.headline: Download, install and open the Yelp app through the Apple App Store.
steps.description: Tap the Yelp app icon to open the app the iPhone screen.

steps.headline: Login to Yelp, using your Yelp login credentials.
Search for the business you'd like to add the photo to.
steps.description: Tap the Search button from the bottom and search in the text box near the top of the screen that displays. Tap the business listing when the corresponding business listing that is displayed.

steps.headline: Tap the Add Photo option button from the business pages front screen listing all the available things you can do for this business, all the reviews and even a place to check in and bookmark the business and a few other choices.
steps.description: The device will open the device's camera.

steps.headline: Take the picture, or tap the square in the lower right corner, if you'd like to upload one you've already taken.
Tap the "Use Photo" button.
steps.description: This will begin the upload process for the business.

steps.headline: Click the "Post" button to post your picture to the appropriate business

tyn: image to upload with you having complete rights to the image
text:
Via the Website Scan your pictures into your computer, or upload your pictures from your camera, depending on where your pictures have been saved/stored. Visit the Yelp webpage. Once the page displays, there are many areas of the page, as well as several text fields to find your item. Search for the business through the business name and location. Towards the top of the page should be two text boxes. Fill in the business name in the top-left box and the location of the EXACT place. (i.e. If your business is located in Philadelphia, and the corporate location is in East Oshkosh, WI, type in Philadelphia, PA", or you may type in the exact zip code of this business. Try not to review corporate locations as locations in other cities. It's a one-to-one deal! On the page that is displayed, you'll find your search suggestions for the business. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/6/6f/Add-a-Business-Photo-on-Yelp-Step-3Bullet1.jpg/v4-460px-Add-a-Business-Photo-on-Yelp-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/6/6f/Add-a-Business-Photo-on-Yelp-Step-3Bullet1.jpg/v4-760px-Add-a-Business-Photo-on-Yelp-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} If the business you want is not displayed, you'll have to do a little more work. Locate the business photo area of the business. It should be just slightly to the right of the business' address. Click the "Add photos" link. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/a/a1/Add-a-Business-Photo-on-Yelp-Step-5.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/a/a1/Add-a-Business-Photo-on-Yelp-Step-5.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Click the (red with white lettering)"Choose photos" button. Choose the photo you want to upload. Wait a few moments for the photo to upload to the Yelp database of photos for the business. Click the "Save" button. Via the Yelp for iPhone App Download, install and open the Yelp app through the Apple App Store. Tap the Yelp app icon to open the app the iPhone screen. Login to Yelp, using your Yelp login credentials. Search for the business you'd like to add the photo to. Tap the Search button from the bottom and search in the text box near the top of the screen that displays. Tap the business listing when the corresponding business listing that is displayed. Tap the Add Photo option button from the business pages front screen listing all the available things you can do for this business, all the reviews and even a place to check in and bookmark the business and a few other choices. The device will open the device's camera. Take the picture, or tap the square in the lower right corner, if you'd like to upload one you've already taken. Tap the "Use Photo" button. This will begin the upload process for the business. Click the "Post" button to post your picture to the appropriate business
sentences: Via the Website Scan your pictures into your computer, or upload your pictures from your camera, depending on where your pictures have been saved/stored.
Visit the Yelp webpage.
Once the page displays, there are many areas of the page, as well as several text fields to find your item.
Search for the business through the business name and location.
Towards the top of the page should be two text boxes.
Fill in the business name in the top-left box and the location of the EXACT place.
(i.e.
If your business is located in Philadelphia, and the corporate location is in East Oshkosh, WI, type in Philadelphia, PA", or you may type in the exact zip code of this business.
Try not to review corporate locations as locations in other cities.
It's a one-to-one deal!
On the page that is displayed, you'll find your search suggestions for the business.

{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/6\/6f\/Add-a-Business-Photo-on-Yelp-Step-3Bullet1.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Business-Photo-on-Yelp-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/6\/6f\/Add-a-Business-Photo-on-Yelp-Step-3Bullet1.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Business-Photo-on-Yelp-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"} If the business you want is not displayed, you'll have to do a little more work.
Locate the business photo area of the business.
It should be just slightly to the right of the business' address.
Click the "Add photos" link.

{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/a\/a1\/Add-a-Business-Photo-on-Yelp-Step-5.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/a\/a1\/Add-a-Business-Photo-on-Yelp-Step-5.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"} Click the (red with white lettering)"Choose photos" button.
Choose the photo you want to upload.
Wait a few moments for the photo to upload to the Yelp database of photos for the business.
Click the "Save" button.
Via the Yelp for iPhone App Download, install and open the Yelp app through the Apple App Store.
Tap the Yelp app icon to open the app the iPhone screen.
Login to Yelp, using your Yelp login credentials.
Search for the business you'd like to add the photo to.
Tap the Search button from the bottom and search in the text box near the top of the screen that displays.
Tap the business listing when the corresponding business listing that is displayed.

Tap the Add Photo option button from the business pages front screen listing all the available things you can do for this business, all the reviews and even a place to check in and bookmark the business and a few other choices.
The device will open the device's camera.
Take the picture, or tap the square in the lower right corner, if you'd like to upload one you've already taken.
Tap the "Use Photo" button.
This will begin the upload process for the business.
Click the "Post" button to post your picture to the appropriate business
